#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int flag, count[256]={0},k,i,ans=0;
		char a[100001];
		cin>>a;
		k = strlen(a);
		for(i=0;i<k;i++)
		{
		if(a[i]=='T')
		ans++;
		else
		ans--;
		if(ans<0)
		break;
		}
		
		
		if(ans==0)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
}
